transform_handler.py

1 #!/usr/bin/env python
2 
3 # Libs
4 import rospy
5 import copy
6 from tf2_ros import Buffer, StaticTransformBroadcaster, TransformListener
7 from tf.transformations import euler_from_quaternion, quaternion_from_euler
8 
9 # Messages
10 from niryo_robot_msgs.msg import CommandStatus
11 from geometry_msgs.msg import TransformStamped, Quaternion
12 
13 from niryo_robot_tools_commander.msg import TCP
14 
15 # Services
16 from niryo_robot_msgs.srv import SetBool, Trigger
17 from niryo_robot_tools_commander.srv import SetTCP
18 
19 
20 class ToolTransformHandler:
21  """
22  This class uses a tfBuffer to handle transforms related to the tools.
23  """
24 
25  def __init__(self):
26  self.__tf_buffer = Buffer()
27  self.__tf_listener = TransformListener(self.__tf_buffer)
28  self.__static_broadcaster = StaticTransformBroadcaster()
29 
30  self.__tool_transform = self.empty_transform()
31  self.__tcp_transform = self.empty_transform()
32  self.__enable_tcp = False
33 
34  # Publisher
35  self.__tcp_publisher = rospy.Publisher('~tcp', TCP, queue_size=10, latch=True)
36  rospy.Timer(rospy.Duration.from_sec(0.5), self.__send_tcp_transform)
37 
38  # Services
39  rospy.Service('~set_tcp', SetTCP, self.__callback_set_tcp)
40  rospy.Service('~reset_tcp', Trigger, self.__callback_reset_tcp)
41  rospy.Service('~enable_tcp', SetBool, self.__callback_enable_tcp)
42 
43  def __callback_set_tcp(self, req):
44  self.__enable_tcp = True
45 
46  t = self.empty_transform()
47 
48  if req.orientation == Quaternion():
49  t.transform.rotation = Quaternion(*quaternion_from_euler(req.rpy.roll, req.rpy.pitch, req.rpy.yaw))
50  else:
51  t.transform.rotation = req.orientation
52 
53  t.transform.translation.x = req.position.x
54  t.transform.translation.y = req.position.y
55  t.transform.translation.z = req.position.z
56 
57  self.set_tcp(t)
58  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "Success"
59 
60  def __callback_reset_tcp(self, _):
61  self.set_tcp(copy.deepcopy(self.__tool_transform))
62  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "Success"
63 
64  def __callback_enable_tcp(self, req):
65  self.__enable_tcp = req.value
66  self.__send_tcp_transform(None)
67  self.__publish_tcp_transform()
68  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "Success"
69 
70  def set_tool(self, tool_transform):
71  """
72  Updates the transform object_base -> tool_link_target in local tfBuffer
73  :param grip:
74 
75  """
76  self.__tool_transform = tool_transform
77  return self.set_tcp(copy.deepcopy(self.__tool_transform))
78 
79  def set_tcp(self, tcp_transform):
80  """
81  Updates the transform object_base -> tool_link_target in local tfBuffer
82  :param grip:
83 
84  """
85  self.__tcp_transform = tcp_transform
86  self.__tcp_transform.header.stamp = rospy.Time.now()
87  self.__tf_buffer.set_transform(self.__tcp_transform, "default_authority")
88  self.__send_tcp_transform(None)
89  self.__publish_tcp_transform()
90  return True
91 
92  def __publish_tcp_transform(self):
93  msg = TCP()
94  msg.enabled = self.__enable_tcp
95 
96  msg.position.x = self.__tcp_transform.transform.translation.x
97  msg.position.y = self.__tcp_transform.transform.translation.y
98  msg.position.z = self.__tcp_transform.transform.translation.z
99  msg.orientation = self.__tcp_transform.transform.rotation
100  msg.rpy.roll, msg.rpy.pitch, msg.rpy.yaw = euler_from_quaternion(
101  [msg.orientation.x, msg.orientation.y, msg.orientation.z, msg.orientation.w])
102 
103  self.__tcp_publisher.publish(msg)
104 
105  def __send_tcp_transform(self, _):
106  t = self.__tcp_transform if self.__enable_tcp else self.empty_transform()
107  t.header.stamp = rospy.Time.now()
108 
109  self.__static_broadcaster.sendTransform(t)
110 
111  @staticmethod
112  def transform_from_dict(dict_):
113  t = TransformStamped()
114  t.transform.translation.x = dict_["translation"][0]
115  t.transform.translation.y = dict_["translation"][1]
116  t.transform.translation.z = dict_["translation"][2]
117 
118  t.transform.rotation.x = dict_["quaternion"][0]
119  t.transform.rotation.y = dict_["quaternion"][1]
120  t.transform.rotation.z = dict_["quaternion"][2]
121  t.transform.rotation.w = dict_["quaternion"][3]
122 
123  t.header.frame_id = "tool_link"
124  t.child_frame_id = "TCP"
125 
126  return t
127 
128  @staticmethod
129  def empty_transform():
130  t = TransformStamped()
131  t.transform.rotation = Quaternion(0, 0, 0, 1)
132  t.header.frame_id = "tool_link"
133  t.header.stamp = rospy.Time.now()
134  t.child_frame_id = "TCP"
135  return t
